_sText:
MAP MADE BY: Westsid3r
**********************'
Map info: NEW V3 VERSION OUT

Spawns: 32
Jails: 6 jails, 1 truck jail and 1 hatch (for those who dont behave )
Shoot4shoot? yes
Gun toss? yes
Race? yes
Arena? Yes for knife and chicken fights

**More info: V2
Map was updated for i3d.net from 24 players to 32!
A new way to the LR games has been made, a new alley that can be accessed from the vent in the new basement office area. 2 new jails have also been made.

***More info: V3
Map has been updated (Total time: 4hours)
*Biggest goal was to balance the map
*A watchtower has been added
*A secret hall way
*Doors have been adjusted, so they dont kill when blocked.
*Some small tweaks

****More info: V4
Map has been updated, again (Total time: 5 hours)
*The biggest goal ever was to balance the map
*New Simon says wall + the SSB
*CT's can now open the secret alley door, means that it can be opened with a simple "USE" press
*Some extended CT camp area
*Another Terrorist rebel way
*Some minor changes

PICTURES
1. View from ct spawn. 
2. The office
3. The freaky race course!
4. The jails
5. The new sneaky alley!
6. The new Simon Says wall + my own unique created idea, the SSB (Simon Safety Box)

Special thanks toÂ´:
Scytha, for the police car prefab. - http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/231
Mr-Raptor, for the office prefab - http://www.fpsbanana.com/prefabs/2240
EastSider and i3d.net, for support.

NOTE:
The police carprefab is original by Scytha.
I changed Raptors office because it was too small, I changed the size of it, twisted the desks and chairs around, made an head office, made toilets and basement.
